pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assessment of Diagnostic and Prognostic Markers // Provides estimations of the Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) curve and the Area Under the Curve (AUC) based on the two- stages mixed-subjects ROC curve estimator (Diaz-Coto et al. (2020) doi:10.1515/ijb-2019-0097 and Diaz-Coto et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/00949655.2020.1736071).
